pages.caption: The Blue Ink — A Form 1017-C materializes. Nobody ordered an audit.
The Fax Screams — Every machine on the floor SHRIEKS in unison.
The Silence — Sound drains from the building. The clock stops.
The Phantom Refill — A pen fills itself with blue ink on the desk.
The Inspection — An invisible force checks every form, every stamp.
The Phone Buzz — A phone lights up where no phone should be.
THE AUDIT DEMON — Eight feet tall. Pinstripe suit. Blank oval face.
Stan Steps Forward — CRACK. A rubber band snaps. He draws its gaze.
Red Tape — Literal bureaucratic tentacles wrapped in fine print.
Level 42 — Barb invokes the Collective Bargain. The audit ENDS.
The Retreat — The demon dissolves back into the fax machine.
Aftermath — Morale drops to -10%. Simultaneously promoted and demoted.
